FuncDef:
The expire-date command sets the expiration date of a local access account.
The undo expire-date command restores the default expiration date of a local access account. The expire-date command sets the expiration date of a local access account. The undo expire-date command restores the default expiration date of a local access account. By default, a local access account is permanently valid. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the expiration date of the local access account.
The value is in the format of YYYY/MM/DD.  YYYY/MM/DD indicates year/month/day. YYYY ranges from 2000 to 2099, MM ranges from 1 to 12, and DD ranges from 1 to 31.
